Sydney: 49 houses
Gosford: 36 houses
Cessnock: 4 houses
Newcastle: 25 houses

If the cities are just grouped in two commmunities, same sunlight, two different pools, donate everything
Total blackouts in Community 1: 296844
Total blackouts in Community 2: 342565
Total Blackouts: 639409
